About Me

I'm a passionate Data Scientist with expertise in machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization. I specialize in turning complex datasets into meaningful insights that drive business decisions.

With a strong foundation in Python, SQL, and various data science tools, I've worked on projects ranging from predictive modeling to business intelligence dashboards. I'm constantly learning and staying updated with the latest trends in data science and AI.

Currently seeking opportunities in data science and analytics where I can leverage my skills to solve challenging problems and contribute to data-driven decision making.

Featured Projects

Customer Churn Model

Developed a predictive churn model using machine learning algorithms to identify customers at risk of leaving. Enabled proactive retention strategies and reduced customer churn significantly.

Python Scikit-learn XGBoost Predictive Modeling

Lead Propensity Model

Built a machine learning model to predict lead conversion probability. Helped sales teams prioritize high-value prospects and improved conversion rates through data-driven targeting.

Python Machine Learning Classification Sales Analytics

Behavioral Clustering

Implemented unsupervised learning algorithms to segment customers based on behavioral patterns. Enabled personalized marketing campaigns and improved customer engagement strategies.

Python Clustering K-Means Customer Segmentation

Intelligence System

Developed an intelligent analytics system that processes large volumes of data to generate actionable business insights. Integrated multiple data sources for comprehensive analysis.

Python Data Engineering ETL Business Intelligence

LLM-Powered Solutions

Python LLM NLP Transformers

AI-Powered Customer Insights
